Are the Callaway Strata golf clubs worth buying? - Quora
s: Answer: By all means YES. They cost less than a single Driver is sold! Buy the set, and have the set clubweighted to ensure they all have the same feel (out of the factory clubs can weigh from a C8 to a D4, if this doesn’t make sense do your homework and find out how clubs are weighted).

s: August 18, 2023 - When it comes to golf equipment, few brands can match the quality Callaway offers. If you’re a beginner looking for a decent golf club set, consider the Callaway Strata or Callaway Edge. Callaway Strata is a fantastic golf club set with everything you need to start playing.
